short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates QR Code for the current tab url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you would like just to simply share currently opened tab url  you need just few trivial steps:
- Install an extension
- Open tab which you would like to share
- Click the extension button
- Scan by your phone generated QR code
This extension is trivial, open source and do not collect any information about you, just do it's job.
